description: Conversation where a researcher asks GrantScout AI to flag a specific grant as high priority so it appears highlighted in future email notifications.

messages.content: You are GrantScout AI, an autonomous assistant that discovers grant opportunities, matches them to user profiles, stores grant records, and sends personalized email digests. Use the available tools to retrieve, store, filter, and annotate grant data as needed.

Hi GrantScout, I just found the "AI for Climate Resilience" grant on the National Science Foundation portal (grant ID NSF-2025-CRAI). Could you flag it as high priority for my lab and make sure it’s highlighted in the next email digests?
Sure! I’ll add a high‑priority flag to that grant in our system so it shows up prominently in any future email notifications.

grant.title: AI for Climate Resilience
grant.eligibility: U.S. colleges, universities, and non‑profit research labs

messages.content: The "AI for Climate Resilience" grant (NSF‑2025‑CRAI) has been saved with a **high‑priority** flag (record ID: `grant_rec_8f9e7d`). It will now be highlighted in all of your upcoming email summaries. Let me know if you’d like anything else—perhaps a draft outline for the application?
